DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose study evaluate effect interleukin-2 give combination pembrolizumab . Interleukin-2 ( IL-2 ) also call aldesleukin , Proleukin™ . Pembrolizumab also call Keytruda™ , anti-PD-1 antibody .
